item.title: The Once - You're My Best Friend
item.description:
Woo
you make me live
Whatever this world
can give to me
It’s you
you’re all I see
Woo you make me live
now honey
Woo
you make me live
Oh
you’re the best friend
That I ever
had
I’ve been with you
such a long time
You’re my sunshine
and I want you to know
That my feelings are
true
I really love you
you’re my best friend
Woo
you make me live
Oh I’ve been
wandering round
Still
in rain or shine
You’ve stood
by me girl
I’m happy at home
you’re my best friend
Woo
you make me live
Whenever this world is
cruel to me
I got you
to help me forgive
Woo you make me live
now honey
Woo
you make me live
Oh
you’re the first one
When things turn
out bad
You know
I’ll never be lonely
You’re my only one
and I love the things
I really love
the things that you do
You’re my best friend
woo you make me live

I’m happy
you’re my best friend
Oh oh
you’re my best friend
Woo
you make me live
Woo
you’re my best friend
